-={ NOTES }=-

A simple killbox map used to test entities, custom textures and sounds. 
It is the first map of the Cataclysm SeriesÂ¸ it (maybe) will be the jail for the serie's next map : surf_cataclysm_v1


-={ INSTALLATION }=-

Go to your Counter-Strike : Source folder in your [ Steam ] folder. 
	C:\...\Steam\steamapp\**username**\counter-strike source\cstrike
     or D:\...	if you have two hard drives

Then open the [ maps ] folder and put [ kb_cataclysm_testbox_v1.bsp ] there.
You should now be able to play on it.

The full path should be this :
	C:\...\Steam\steamapp\**username**\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\kb_cataclysm_testbox_v1.bsp


-={ SPECIALS THANKS }=-

To the Homeworld 2 team for the music.
To Alpinekat for the Large Hadron Rap.


-={ CLANS }=-
